lerp

public static UVertex lerp(float t,
                           UVertex v1,

lerp

public UVertex lerp(float t,
                    UVertex v2)
Returns a new UVertex instance that is the linear interpolation between this vertex and the input v2 at the fraction t.

Parameters:
t - Fraction of interpolated values (normally [0..1])
v2 -
Returns:
New UVertex instance with the interpolated result

lerpSelf

public UVertex lerpSelf(float t,
                        UVertex v2)
Calculates the linear interpolation between this vertex and the input v2 at the fraction t. The value of this UVertex instance is set to the interpolated result.

Parameters:
t - Fraction of interpolated values (normally [0..1])
v2 -
Returns:
Reference to this UVertex, updated with the interpolated result

dist

public float dist(UVertex v1)
Distance between XYZ of this vertex and XYZ of v1

Parameters:
v1 -
Returns:
Distance according to Pythagoras theorem

distSq

public float distSq(UVertex v1)
Calculate the squared distance between XYZ of this vertex and XYZ of v1. Omits the sqrt() step of dist() for efficiency

Parameters:
v1 -
Returns:
Returns sq(v1.x-x)+sq(v1.y-y)+sq(v1.z-z)

distSimple

public float distSimple(UVertex v1)
Simplistic distance calculation. Useful in many cases where real distance calculation is overkill

Parameters:
v1 -
Returns:
Absolute value abs(v1.x-x)+abs(v1.y-y)+abs(v1.z-z)
